DataElement.preferredName: Geographic Area Time Zone Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response that the time zone is other than what is specified on the form.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any demarcated area of the Earth; may be determined by both natural and human boundaries._A geographic region throughout which the same standard time is used.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: All of the continents and every country situated within, the UNITED STATES and each of the constituent states arranged by region, CANADA and each of its provinces, AUSTRALIA and each of its states, the major bodies of water and major islands on both hemispheres, and selected major cities. Although the geographic locations are not printed in INDEX MEDICUS as main headings, in indexing they are significant in epidemiologic studies and historical articles and for locating administrative units in education and the delivery of health care.

Concepts.definition: Any demarcated area of the Earth; may be determined by both natural and human boundaries.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
